CustomField.formula: IF( Email_Opt_Out__c =True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red",20,20), IF( Related_Contact_is_Email_Opt_Out__c =True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow",20,20), NULL))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: - Red Flag signifies that all contacts from Prospect-Client have specified Email Opt Out. - Yellow Flag signifies that at least one related contact has specified Email Opt Out
CustomField.label: Email Opt-Out Flag
